tasks: Document your learning in a journal
Practice UX Fundamentals through small projects
Get feedback from peers or mentors
Analyze case studies in your focus area
Apply new skills to a real project
Create a portfolio piece showcasing your work
Share your progress with the community
Review and reflect on your growth

resources.readup: As an emerging senior UX designer, you have a solid foundation in the fundamentals of UX design and a keen eye for visual design. Now, focus on elevating your skills in user research, product thinking, and collaboration to drive more impactful designs that meet users' needs.

resources.title: 10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design
resources.description: 7 10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design ================================================= Jakob Nielsen ![](https://media.nngroup.com/medi...

topics.name: Mastering Usability Heuristics for Emerging Seniors
topics.summary: Applying usability heuristics effectively requires a deep understanding of the 10 principles outlined in '10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design'. By mastering these, you'll improve your ability to design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
practice_points: Analyze 5 existing products using the 10 Usability Heuristics framework and document your findings
Create a heuristic evaluation guide for a specific product or feature
Design an interface based on the 'Visibility of System Status' heuristic and justify your design decisions

topics.name: Applying Aesthetic-Usability Effect in Visual Design
topics.summary: The Aesthetic-Usability Effect highlights the importance of visual elements in user experience. By understanding and applying this principle, you'll create more engaging and effective designs.
practice_points: Conduct an experiment to test the effect of color on user engagement (e.g., using a tool like OptinMonster)
Design 3 wireframes with varying levels of visual hierarchy and typography
Create a style guide that incorporates the Aesthetic-Usability Effect principles

topics.name: Developing Effective User Research Methods for Emerging Seniors
topics.summary: As an emerging senior UX designer, it's essential to develop effective user research methods to inform your design decisions. By mastering these techniques, you'll gather more accurate and actionable insights.
practice_points: Conduct 2 user interviews using the Empathy Mapping technique and document your findings
Create a user research plan for a specific project or feature
Analyze 5 existing user research studies to identify best practices
